title: has this happened to anyone??? help !!
body: after the recent patch ( not sure if this is the issue ), my LoL client keeps tabbing out in game constantly and it is really annoying, has this happened to anyone, does anyone know how to fix it ???

replies.body: If I understand correctly, the client is forcing open while you're already in a game?  Are you on a mac or pc?  I'm wondering if you might have a setting or binding that's cause you to tab out.  As an alternative you can also[ close the client during the game](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png), and it will reopen once the match is finished.
my mistake, the cilent isnt forcing the tab out, the game just tabs out to the main screen just like when u press alt tab

I was having trouble with this too. The background client pops up when the in-game client is in use.  like the guy said, I closed the window that forcefully pops open and then click on my game window. after that, everything was o.k.
